item.title: When do you shower
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:15, topic:144217”][quote author=victor_ZOLO link=topic=197723.msg1763757#msg1763757 date=1190075905]
mj I take shower every mornning and night prevert
[/quote]

Mornning and prevert art not words… And I’m pretty sure no one has the name of MJ[/quote]

I’m pretty sure myself “art” is not a term used in the current English language, and does make your sentence in a fragment. But what do I know.

Anyways, I get a shower every morning, and sometimes I’ll get in my jacuzzi at night and just chill out. If I’ve been working late that day, or I had a game, I’ll take a shower at night.
